maple: positions := proc(e,ll) local a,k,l,m; l := ll; m := 1; a := []; while(member(e,l[m..nops(l)],'k')) do a := [op(a),(k+m-1)]; m := k+m; od; RETURN(a); end;
mathematica: Position[With[{k = Sqrt[2]}, Table[Floor[Floor[k^2*j] - k*Floor[k*j]], {j, 0, 300}]], 1] - 1 // Flatten (* _Jean-Fran√ßois Alcover_, Mar 06 2016 *)
